Specialization of {{lc|std::formatter}} that defines formatting rules for a {{lc|std::chrono::duration}}. The {{tt|duration}} is interpreted as the time of day since midnight.

The {{lc|std::formatter}} specialization is usually not directly accessed, but is used through [[cpp/utility/format|formatting functions]].
